@graph.name: Simple COVID-19 - PE Variation
@graph.description:
Analysis of variation within individual COVID-19 samples (Paired End Illumina). Does not use paured

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [From NCBI's Sequence Read Archive (SRA) to Galaxy: SARS-CoV-2 variant analysis](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/variant-analysis/tutorials/sars-cov-2/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
